FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.
I cuori di Bant sono puri come la sua aria e luminosi come i suoi cieli.
Die Herzen in Bant sind so rein wie die Luft und so hell wie der Himmel.
Les cœurs de Bant sont aussi purs que son air et aussi limpides que ses cieux.
Los corazones de Bant son puros como su aire y brillantes como sus cielos.
バントの中心は、その空気と同じぐらい清らかで、その空と同じぐらい明るい。
Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.
Сердца Бэнта чисты, как его воздух, и светлы, как его небо.
Os corações de Bant são tão puros quanto seu ar, tão límpidos quanto seus céus.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() local effectController = EffectController() effectController:MarkSearchedLibrary() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:AddSupertype( SUPERTYPE_BASIC ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_PLAINS ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_ISLAND ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_FOREST ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_ANY_SUB_TYPE ) filter:May() filter:SetZone( ZONE_LIBRARY ) filter:SetPlayer( effectController ) effectController:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_LAND_TO_PUT_ONTO_BATTLEFIELD", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:PutIntoPlayTapped( EffectController() ) end
